Session Storage
For a full description please visit the project repository on the GitHub.

This extension is used to store and reuse your browsing sessions. Four types of operations are possible:
  • SAVE - saves the current browsing session of current window in local memory under the provided name.
  • EDIT - Available under the SAVE button. If a session with provided name already exists it is overwritten with the current session.
  • DELETE - deletes from memory a session with provided name.
  • REOPEN - reopens a session with provided name in the current window.

PURPOSE
The main purpose of this extension is to be
  • light - does not take lot of space or resources after installing
  • easy - is easy and comfortable to use
  • fast - performs well and fast
  • simple - is focues on the three main actions without complicated actions or clicks

    • SAFETY
    All stored items are saved in the local memory of your browser - there's no database used or remote server.
    Your data stays with you.
